item.description:
What better Ex-Midwest event then to watch a Monday Night Football game between two longtime midwest rival Football Teams that both have good teams this year (Bears vs. Lions)!!

 

Also I have the perfect place to watch it.  Its a bar that is centrally located which is right in front of a T Station but also has plenty of free and very accessible street parking right by there.  In addition this place has an incredible sound system and 10 large TV's that surround the place!

 

So please join me at Blue 22 located in downtown Quincy right in front of Quincy Center less than 5 minute walk, the address is 1237 Hancock Street, Quincy, MA 02169-4342.  I know its Monday night and we all have school or work the next morning, but who cares its Monday Night Football and its featuring two Midwest Teams!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Blue 22 in Quincy 1237 Hancock Street, Quincy, MA 02169-4342
item.name: Monday Night Football
